mark@janiczak.me

Mark Janiczak

Web Developer

Brisbane, Australia

About Me

I'm a budding web developer with multitudes of experience in vastly different fields. Currently, I spend most of my spare time helping talented individuals and blossoming businesses with improving the design and experience of their websites as well as optimising them for speed and search results. I have spent the last two years familiarising myself with the world of ecommerce while working in a support role for Neto eCommerce.

I am currently studying part-time at the University of Queensland (UQ) where I study IT and mechanical engineering. It’s there that I quickly found I had a passion for consulting, data structures, analytics and all things web. While I’m in no hurry to graduate as I enjoy working while studying, at my current pace I expect to graduate in 2019.

I’m always happy to learn something new, help others understand and tend to keep well organised. My 3-year-old labrador keeps me busy every other day in between work and study and is the friendliest animal this side of Brisbane. I also get a kick out of trying new recipes and (rarely) succeeding.

Résumé

Expertise

I have a variety of development skills ranging from front-end design, experience and optimisation to server-side applications typically based in Google Cloud and Firebase using Node. Having spent many years in software support roles, I enjoy being hands on with clients and really digging down to find the best solution.

I specialise in:

  • Website Design and Development
  • Front End Optimisation
  • Marketing/Analytics Tag Management and Implementation
  • Single page applications

I'm very familiar with these languages:

  • Javascript
  • Python
  • Neto B@se (proprietary)

I've used these front end frameworks regularly:

  • React
  • Vue
  • Bootstrap
  • Material UI

And these back end frameworks:

  • Express
  • Django

I use these tools daily:

  • Webpack
  • Gulp
  • Jira
  • Docker

I know my way around these platforms:

  • Google Firebase - Hosting, Cloud Functions, Cloud Storage, Realtime Database
  • Heroku
  • Neto
  • AWS - Lambda, S3, RDS
  • Wordpress

Experience

Neto eCommerce

Enterprise Support

Feb 2018 - Present

After a year in the general support team at Neto I moved into an enterprise support role looking after Neto's XL subscription customers. I dealt with a smaller set of customers on a more regular basis which was more of a consulting nature rather than support.

Web Application Support

Feb 2017 - Feb 2018

Neto is an eCommerce software company based in Brisbane. I worked with customers with their web design queries, our eBay and shipping integrations and general platform usage.

neto.com.au

ISGQ

Managed Services Support

July 2015 - Feb 2017

Integrated Solutions Group Queensland (ISGQ) is a Managed IT Services company based in Brisbane. I worked at ISGQ for just over a year assisting with infastructure projects, managing backups, administrating Office 365 environments and providing general support for customers. I also assisted the company with developing their website at the time.

isgq.com.au

RoyalCDS

Service Desk Support

Sep 2014 - July 2015

RoyalCDS distributes food products for retail and food service business around Australia. I started my career here as in-house IT support and assisted employees with any technical issues they had. I also took it upon myself to review the way the employees worked and made many suggestions to improve their workflow.

royalfoods.com.au
